text: Guillermo Sober贸n Acevedo (29 December 1925 - 12 October 2020) was a Mexican politician, chemist, physician and educator. He was born in Iguala, Guerrero. Between 1973 to 1981, he was rector of the National Autonomous University of Mexico. From 1982 to 1988, he was Secretary of Health during the Miguel de la Madrid presidency. Sober贸n Acevedo died on 12 October 2020 in Mexico City at the age of 94.Fallece Guillermo Sober贸n, exrector de la UNAM ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Mexican academics Category:Mexican scientists Category:Chemists Category:Mexican physicians Category:People from Guerrero (state)
